headline: Should eBay's (EBAY) $1 Billion Debt Raise Prompt a Closer Look at Its Growth Plans?
summary: Earlier this month, eBay Inc. completed a US$1 billion debt offering, issuing US$600 million in 4.250% senior unsecured notes due 2029 and US$400 million in 5.125% notes due 2035, with Citigroup, Deutsche Bank, and Goldman Sachs as lead underwriters. This move strengthens eBay's liquidity and financial flexibility, enabling the company to invest in platform enhancements and manage ongoing margin pressures highlighted in recent guidance. We'll explore how eBay's new debt financing and capital...
